verses.verse: Josiah <S%H2977><s%> was <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>; and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, and turned not <S%H5493>aside<s%> to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left<s%>.

For in the <S%H8083>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%>, while he was yet <S%H5288>young<s%>, he <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> after the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>; and in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> he <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H2891>purge<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> from the high <S%H1116>places<s%>, and the <S%H842>Asherim<s%>, and the graven <S%H6456>images<s%>, and the molten <S%H4541>images<s%>.

And they brake <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4196>altars<s%> of the <S%H1168>Baalim<s%> in his <S%H6440>presence<s%>; and the <S%H2553>sun-images<s%> that were on high above <S%H4605>them<s%> he hewed <S%H1438>down<s%>; and the <S%H842>Asherim<s%>, and the graven <S%H6456>images<s%>, and the molten <S%H6456>images<s%>, he brake in <S%H7665>pieces<s%>, and made <S%H1854>dust<s%> of <S%H2236>them<s%>, and strewed it <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H6913>graves<s%> of them that had sacrificed unto <S%H2076>them<s%>.
And he <S%H8313>burnt<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> upon their <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H2891>purged<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And so did he in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, even unto <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, in their <S%H2719>ruins<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6213>workmen<s%> that had the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and the <S%H6213>workmen<s%> that <S%H6213>wrought<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to <S%H2388>mend<s%> and <S%H918>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>:

And when they brought <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was brought <S%H935>into<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> given <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, I have <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. And <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H935>carried<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and moreover <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, All that was <S%H5414>committed<s%> <S%H3027>to<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, they are <S%H6213>doing<s%>.

And they have <S%H5413>emptied<s%> out the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6485>overseers<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6213>workmen<s%>.

And it came to <S%H4428>pass<s%>, when the king had <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%>, that he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>.

Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H1875>ye<s%>, inquire of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for <S%H7604>me<s%>, and for them that are left in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, concerning the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> that is <S%H4672>found<s%>; for <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that is poured <S%H5413>out<s%> upon <S%H1>us<s%>, because our fathers have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> according unto all that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%>.
